name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, the water in Bazhou, Hebei was still half a meter deep.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Late at night on July 27, the Global Times published an article formally demanding that the British Museum return Chinese cultural relics.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 27, an indiscriminate wounding incident occurred in Xiangcheng District, Zhangzhou City, Fujian Province. The official report said that the murderer stabbed three people with scissors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the regular press conference of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on August 28, a Bloomberg reporter asked whether China would discuss with Japan whether the seafood caught in Fukushima waters is safe, and why the risk of nuclear contamination spreads to the world's oceans, but China's seafood import ban only targets Japan. The spokesperson did not respond directly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 28, at the gate of the Fourth Experimental Primary School in Wuxiang New District, Nanning

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Douyin launched the "Help Mount Fuji Erupt" special effect

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 28, citizens saw a large number of military vehicles moving across the Nanjing Yangtze River Bridge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
On August 27, the current situation of Chongqing's famous online celebrity attraction Baixiangju

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced that starting from August 30, people coming to China will no longer need to undergo nucleic acid or antigen testing for the new coronavirus before entering the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Cantonese organization "Hong Kong Language Studies" announced its disbandment because an article in a Cantonese essay competition three years ago was suspected of violating the National Security Law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 27, a middle school in Changsha, Hunan Province, held military training in the rain, and teachers watched with umbrellas.
The Education Bureau responded: Are teachers and students the same? There is no absolute equality.
The United States and Japan want to destroy China, so what does it matter if we suffer a little?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 28, the People's Daily reported that a large number of Japanese harassing calls were made to the Chinese Embassy in Japan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is said online that an overseas Chinese blogger claimed that he received a PR letter hoping that he would whitewash Japan’s nuclear waste water discharge. But shouldn’t Japan’s official statement be “ALPS treated water”?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I wish you all a happy postgraduate entrance examination!
On August 28, the official announcement
In order to further promote Xi Jinping's new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics into textbooks, classrooms and minds, and better implement the fundamental task of cultivating morality and cultivating people, the Central Propaganda Department and the Ministry of Education organized the compilation of "Introduction to Xi Jinping's New Era of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics" (hereinafter referred to as "Introduction"). The textbook has been jointly published by Higher Education Press and People's Publishing House and will be distributed nationwide from now on.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 28, according to the website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission, Sun Zhigang, former secretary of the Guizhou Provincial Party Committee, is suspected of serious violations of discipline and laws and is currently undergoing disciplinary review and supervision investigation by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission.
